name: World Cancer Research Fund International
bossPosition: Executive Director, Science and Public Affairs
goal:
World Cancer Research Fund International is the world's leading authority on cancer prevention research related to diet, weight and physical activity.

Our vision is to live in a world where no one develops a preventable cancer.

World Cancer Research Fund International is a not-for-profit organisation that leads and unifies a network of cancer charities with a global reach. These cancer charities are based on Europe, the Americas and Asia.
euInitiatives:
Prevention of cancer and other non-communicable diseases:
- AVMSD consultation (October 2015)
